title: Drawing, "Tribonian Presents Pandects to Emperor Julian, after Perino del Vaga; Sketch of Trophy", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush and sepia wash on off white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tribonian Presents Pandects to Emperor Julian, after Perino del Vaga; Sketch of Trophy", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and dark brown ink, brush and sepia wash on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-535.
